Text: DoctorsSorry to cut you off Dr Boxleiter called me back He was unaware that Dad might be released soon and also said that he thought that it would be premature to do so He promised to look into Dads release and let us know what is going on Boxleiter also told me that Dad is on some different medication Ridilin sic an appetite stimulant Rimeron and possibly Buspar still Mom was unaware of the Ridilin Here are the Doctors telephone numbers Boxleiter Herman Schoup Let me know if you and when you reach them so that we dont both badger them I will do the same My plan is to call every day until I reach them Failing that I will be in MPLS this week and able to fly down on a moments notice Take care Rob PS Dad was moved to room which is Skilled Care a Medicare thing
